Scenario_Setup: Thunder Wing (Level 2 Flight + Rifle) vs Ground Hammer (Level 2 Super Strength + Shotgun) - Urban Street
Turn_By_Turn_Description: Turn 1: Thunder Wing wins initiative (AGL 55 + Flight bonus). Action: Takeoff to Altitude 2 (30 feet). Ground Hammer moves behind car for cover. Turn 2: Thunder Wing shoots rifle from altitude (-1CS for height). Rolls Major Success (Yellow) - hits for 22 damage. Ground Hammer throws car at Thunder Wing (STR 60 vs 2800lb car). Rolls Critical Success (Red) - car travels 4 squares, hits Thunder Wing for 70 damage! Turn 3: Thunder Wing critically injured, attempts emergency landing. Ground Hammer charges for finishing blow.
Critical_Hit_Details: Thunder Wing takes car impact: Rolls on Critical Hit table - Broken Ribs (1d6 Stamina drain + carrying capacity halved)
Injury_Results: Thunder Wing: 22 rifle damage taken; Ground Hammer: 70 car impact damage + Broken Ribs status
Property_Damage: Car destruction ($25000); Window damage from gunfire ($5000); Street cleanup ($2000)
Legal_Consequences: Grand Theft Auto (car theft); Property destruction; Reckless endangerment
Tactical_Lessons: Flight advantage negated by environmental object throwing; Altitude vulnerable to heavy thrown objects

Scenario_Setup: Storm Rider (Level 3 Flight + Lightning) vs Tank (Level 3 Super Durability + Heavy Weapons) - Open Field
Turn_By_Turn_Description: Turn 1: Storm Rider wins initiative. Flies to Altitude 4 (150 feet). Tank deploys heavy machine gun. Turn 2: Storm Rider lightning strike from altitude. Turn 3: Storm Rider maintains altitude, second lightning attack. Tank continues suppressive fire. Turn 4: Storm Rider attempts dive attack for close lightning. Tank readies for close-range heavy weapons.

Scenario_Setup: Bone Crusher (Level 2 Super Strength) vs Speed Demon (Level 2 Super Speed) - Urban Alley
Turn_By_Turn_Description: Turn 1: Speed Demon wins initiative (AGL 60 + Speed bonus). Multiple attacks: Punch combo. First punch Major Success 28 damage. Second punch Critical Success - rolls on Crit table: ARM BLOW (main weapon arm suffers -1CS until healed). Bone Crusher retaliates with super strength punch. Turn 2: Bone Crusher (injured arm) swings with off-hand at -2CS penalty. Speed Demon dodges easily. Speed Demon continues combo attacks targeting legs. Turn 3: Speed Demon leg attack rolls Critical Success: HAMSTRING (1d6 Dex damage + movement speed reduced to 10 until recovery). Bone Crusher now severely mobility impaired.
Critical_Hit_Details: Speed Demon's critical hits: ARM BLOW affects Bone Crusher's main fighting arm (-1CS penalty). HAMSTRING attack causes 1d6 Dex damage + movement reduction
Injury_Results: Bone Crusher: 28 punch damage + ARM BLOW (-1CS weapon arm) + HAMSTRING (Dex damage + movement 10'); Speed Demon: minimal damage
Property_Damage: Alley dumpster knocked over ($200); Brick wall cracked from super strength miss ($1500)
Tactical_Lessons: Speed allows multiple attacks vs strength; Targeting specific body parts creates lasting injuries; Mobility damage especially effective vs slow fighters

Scenario_Setup: Iron Guardian (Level 4 Tech Enhancement + Power Armor) vs Psychic Storm (Level 4 Psychic Powers) - Government Building Interior
Turn_By_Turn_Description: Turn 1: Psychic Storm wins initiative (mental speed). Psychic Blast attack bypasses all physical armor! Rolls Critical Success: TEMPORARY AMNESIA (confused for 1d6 rounds). Iron Guardian confused, attacks random direction. Turn 2: Iron Guardian (confused) accidentally punches government wall. STR 70 vs reinforced concrete - wall breaks! Creates opening. Psychic Storm mind control attempt. Turn 3: Mind control fails (Iron Guardian's tech provides mental shielding). Iron Guardian recovers from confusion, targets Psychic Storm with heavy weapons. Turn 4: Heavy weapons vs unarmored psychic. Major Success - devastating damage.
Critical_Hit_Details: Iron Guardian confusion causes random action hitting government wall. Psychic Storm's psychic blast causes TEMPORARY AMNESIA critical hit
Injury_Results: Iron Guardian: Temporary Amnesia (confusion); Psychic Storm: Heavy weapons damage (45 damage to unarmored target)
Property_Damage: Government wall destruction ($25000); Security system damage ($15000); Classified area exposure
Legal_Consequences: Federal property destruction; Security breach; Potential treason charges
Tactical_Lessons: Psychic powers bypass tech armor; Confusion can cause friendly fire; Tech provides some mental protection; Government building damage = federal charges

Scenario_Setup: Flame Thrower (Level 2 Fire Powers) vs Ice Queen (Level 2 Ice Powers) - Chemical Plant
Turn_By_Turn_Description: Turn 1: Flame Thrower wins initiative. Fire blast attack. Ice Queen counters with ice wall defense. Powers interact: Fire vs Ice creates steam cloud (visibility penalty). Turn 2: Steam cloud affects both fighters (-2CS to sight-based actions). Ice Queen ice projectiles. Flame Thrower dodges but fire blast hits chemical storage tank! Turn 3: Chemical tank explosion! Both fighters take explosion damage + chemical contamination. Area becomes hazardous (poison gas). Turn 4: Both fighters must evacuate due to toxic environment. Combat ends in draw due to environmental hazard.
Critical_Hit_Details: Chemical tank explosion affects both characters: Explosion damage 3d6 each + Poison status (chemical contamination). Environmental hazard forces combat evacuation
Injury_Results: Flame Thrower: Chemical explosion + poison status; Ice Queen: Chemical explosion + poison status
Property_Damage: Chemical plant explosion ($500K); Environmental contamination ($2M cleanup); Chemical storage destruction
Legal_Consequences: Environmental terrorism charges; EPA violations; Mass evacuation; Superfund cleanup site
Tactical_Lessons: Opposing powers create unique interactions; Environmental hazards can end combat; Chemical storage creates extreme consequences; Power interactions affect visibility and tactics
